snippet.title: Global Conflicts: Latin America Trailer
snippet.description:
Travel Latin America as an investigative journalist out to find the truth and expose the harsh reality to the world.

Latin America is one of the most turbulent and violent regions in the world, where debt slavery, corruption, and trafficking of humans threaten the existence of untold numbers of people. Can you find the evidence to make a difference?
